vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of Arabia living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.16.11;
son of: Abraham (H0085) and Hagar (H1904);
half-brother of: Isaac (H3327), Zimran (H2175), Jokshan (H3370), Medan (H4091), Midian (H4080), Ishbak (H3435) and Shuah (H7744);
father of: Nebaioth (H5032), Kedar (H6938), Adbeel (H0110), Mibsam (H4017), Mishma (H4927), Dumah (H1746), Massa (H4854), Hadad (H2316), Tema (H8485), Jetur (H3195), Naphish (H5305), Kedemah (H6929) and Mahalath (H4258)
§ Ishmael = "God will hear"
1) son of Abraham and Sarah's handmaid Hagar and the progenitor of the Arabian peoples
2) son of Nethaniah and the murderer of Gedaliah
3) a Benjamite, one of the sons of Azel a descendant of Saul through Meribbaal or Mephibosheth
4) a Judaite, father of Zebadiah
5) a Judaite, son of Johanan and one of the captains who aided Jehoiada in restoring Joash to the throne
6) a priest of the family of Pashur with a foreign wife whom he was forced to put away by Ezra
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   hijo de Abraham; (b)   hijo de Netanías; oficial; (c)   hijo de Asel; tribu de Benjamín; (d)   padre de Zebadías, gobernador, tribu de Judá; (e)   hijo de Johanán; oficial del ejército; en tiempos de la reina Atalía; (f)   sacerdote; casado con una esposa extranjera; post exílico
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
以實瑪利 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "神會聽見"
1) 亞伯拉罕和撒萊的使女夏甲所生的兒子, 咸信是阿拉伯人的祖先
2) 尼探雅的兒子, 他是刺殺基大利的凶手 ( #王下 25:25| )
3) 便雅憫人, 亞悉的兒子之一, 掃羅王的孫子米力巴力(或作米非波設)的後裔
(代上 8:38;9:44)
4) 一位猶大人, 西巴第雅的父親 ( #代下 19:11| )
5) 一位猶大人, 約哈難的兒子, 他是幫助耶何耶大恢復約阿施王權的軍長之一
(代下 23:1)
6) 巴施戶珥的子孫之一, 身為祭司且娶了一個外邦女子為妻, 後被以斯拉強迫而
休了該女子 (拉 10:22)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
以实玛利 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "神会听见"
1) 亚伯拉罕和撒莱的使女夏甲所生的儿子, 咸信是阿拉伯人的祖先
2) 尼探雅的儿子, 他是刺杀基大利的凶手 ( #王下 25:25| )
3) 便雅悯人, 亚悉的儿子之一, 扫罗王的孙子米力巴力(或作米非波设)的后裔
(代上 8:38;9:44)
4) 一位犹大人, 西巴第雅的父亲 ( #代下 19:11| )
5) 一位犹大人, 约哈难的儿子, 他是帮助耶何耶大恢复约阿施王权的军长之一
(代下 23:1)
6) 巴施户珥的子孙之一, 身为祭司且娶了一个外邦女子为妻, 后被以斯拉强迫而
休了该女子 (拉 10:22)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 2Ki.25.23;
son of: Nethaniah (H5418)
§ Ishmael = "God will hear"
1) son of Abraham and Sarah's handmaid Hagar and the progenitor of the Arabian peoples
2) son of Nethaniah and the murderer of Gedaliah
3) a Benjamite, one of the sons of Azel a descendant of Saul through Meribbaal or Mephibosheth
4) a Judaite, father of Zebadiah
5) a Judaite, son of Johanan and one of the captains who aided Jehoiada in restoring Joash to the throne
6) a priest of the family of Pashur with a foreign wife whom he was forced to put away by Ezra

A man of the tribe of Benjamin living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.8.38;
son of: Azel (H0682A);
brother of: Azrikam (H5840H), Bocheru (H1074), Sheariah (H8187), Obadiah (H5662J) and Hanan (H2605H)
§ Ishmael = "God will hear"

2) son of Nethaniah and the murderer of Gedaliah
3) a Benjamite, one of the sons of Azel a descendant of Saul through Meribbaal or Mephibosheth
4) a Judaite, father of Zebadiah
5) a Judaite, son of Johanan and one of the captains who aided Jehoiada in restoring Joash to the throne
6) a priest of the family of Pashur with a foreign wife whom he was forced to put away by Ezra
